019    package com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache;
020    
021    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.impl.CacheAPIFactory;
022    import com.smartitengineering.domain.AbstractPersistentDTO;
023    import com.smartitengineering.domain.PersistentDTO;
024    import junit.framework.Test;
025    import junit.framework.TestCase;
026    import junit.framework.TestSuite;
027    import org.hamcrest.beans.HasPropertyWithValue;
028    import org.hamcrest.core.Is;
029    import org.jmock.Expectations;
030    import org.jmock.Mockery;
031    import org.jmock.integration.junit3.JUnit3Mockery;
032    
033    /**
034     * Unit test for simple App.
035     */
036    public class CacheEventRegistrarTest
037        extends TestCase {
038    
039        Mockery context = new JUnit3Mockery();
040    
041        /**
042         * Create the test case
043         *
044         * @param testName name of the test case
045         */
046        public CacheEventRegistrarTest(String testName) {
047            super(testName);
048        }
049    
050        /**
051         * @return the suite of tests being tested
052         */
053        public static Test suite() {
054            return new TestSuite(CacheEventRegistrarTest.class);
055        }
056    
057        /**
058         * Rigourous Test :-)
059         */
060        public void testAddChangeListener() {
061            try {
062                CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().addCacheEventListeners(null,
063                    null);
064                fail("Not expected to pass!");
065            }
066            catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
067            }
068            catch (Exception ex) {
069                ex.printStackTrace();
070                fail("Only IllegalArgException expected!");
071            }
072            try {
073                CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().addCacheEventListeners(
074                    Observee.class,
075                    null);
076                fail("Not expected to pass!");
077            }
078            catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
079            }
080            catch (Exception ex) {
081                ex.printStackTrace();
082                fail("Only IllegalArgException expected!");
083            }
084            try {
085                CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().addCacheEventListeners(null,
086                    null, new ChangeListener[0]);
087                fail("Not expected to pass!");
088            }
089            catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
090            }
091            catch (Exception ex) {
092                ex.printStackTrace();
093                fail("Only IllegalArgException expected!");
094            }
095            try {
096                CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().addCacheEventListeners(
097                    Observee.class,
098                    null, new ChangeListener[2]);
099            }
100            catch (Exception ex) {
101                ex.printStackTrace();
102                fail("No exception expected!");
103            }
104        }
105    
106        public void testRemoveChangeListener() {
107            final ChangeListener allListener = context.mock(ChangeListener.class,
108                "all");
109            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().addCacheEventListeners(
110                Observee.class, null, new ChangeListener[]{allListener});
111            final ChangeListener delListener = context.mock(ChangeListener.class,
112                "del");
113            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().addCacheEventListeners(
114                Observee.class, ChangeEvent.ChangeType.DELETE, new ChangeListener[]{
115                    delListener
116                });
117            context.checking(new Expectations() {
118    
119                {
120                    atMost(2).of(allListener).cacheChanged(with(any(
121                        ChangeEvent.class)));
122                    atMost(1).of(delListener).cacheChanged(with(new HasPropertyWithValue<ChangeEvent>(
123                        "changeType", new Is(equal(ChangeEvent.ChangeType.DELETE)))));
124                }
125            });
126            final Observee source = new Observee();
127            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().fireEvent(CacheAPIFactory.
128                getChangeEvent(source, ChangeEvent.ChangeType.CREATE));
129            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().fireEvent(CacheAPIFactory.
130                getChangeEvent(source, ChangeEvent.ChangeType.DELETE));
131            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().removeListeners(delListener,
132                allListener);
133            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().fireEvent(CacheAPIFactory.
134                getChangeEvent(source, ChangeEvent.ChangeType.CREATE));
135            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().fireEvent(CacheAPIFactory.
136                getChangeEvent(source, ChangeEvent.ChangeType.DELETE));
137        }
138    
139        public void testFireEvent() {
140            final ChangeListener allListener = context.mock(ChangeListener.class,
141                "allFire");
142            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().addCacheEventListeners(
143                Observee.class, null, new ChangeListener[]{allListener});
144            final ChangeListener delListener = context.mock(ChangeListener.class,
145                "delFire");
146            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().addCacheEventListeners(
147                Observee.class, ChangeEvent.ChangeType.DELETE, new ChangeListener[]{
148                    delListener
149                });
150            context.checking(new Expectations() {
151    
152                {
153                    exactly(2).of(allListener).cacheChanged(with(any(
154                        ChangeEvent.class)));
155                    exactly(1).of(delListener).cacheChanged(with(new HasPropertyWithValue<ChangeEvent>(
156                        "changeType", new Is(equal(ChangeEvent.ChangeType.DELETE)))));
157                }
158            });
159            final Observee source = new Observee();
160            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().fireEvent(CacheAPIFactory.
161                getChangeEvent(source, ChangeEvent.ChangeType.CREATE));
162            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().fireEvent(CacheAPIFactory.
163                getChangeEvent(source, ChangeEvent.ChangeType.DELETE));
164            CacheAPIFactory.getCacheEventRegistrar().removeListeners(allListener,
165                delListener);
166        }
167    
168        private class Observee
169            extends AbstractPersistentDTO<Observee>
170            implements PersistentDTO<Observee> {
171    
172            public boolean isValid() {
173                return true;
174            }
175        }
176    }
